dict.string: Sketch the x and y axes on paper to help you figure out the coordinates. Remember that x is the horizontal axis, and y the vertical, with (0, 0) at the center.
The coordinates in the four quadrants will each have a different combination of positive or negative x, y valuesâ€”top right: (+, +), bottom right: (+, -), bottom left: (-, -), and top left: (-, +).
